Instruction:
Step 1: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Step 3: Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Step 4: Add chicken to the pan and cook for 6–7 minutes per side until golden brown.
Step 5: Remove chicken and serve hot.

Step 1: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package instructions.
Step 2: Heat olive oil in a saucepan and sauté garlic.
Step 3: Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step 4: Season with salt and basil.
Step 5: Toss pasta with sauce and serve.

Step 1: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Step 2: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Step 3: Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds.
Step 4: Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes.
Step 5: Season and serve immediately.

Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2: Place salmon on a baking tray.
Step 3: Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
Step 5: Bake for 25–30 minutes and serve.

Step 1: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Step 2: Heat oil in a pan and brown the beef.
Step 3: Season beef with salt and pepper.
Step 4: Assemble bowl with rice and beef.
Step 5: Serve warm.

Step 1: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Step 2: Add curry powder and toast for 30 seconds.
Step 3: Add chickpeas and coconut milk.
Step 4: Simmer for 15 minutes.
Step 5: Serve with rice or bread.

Step 1: Whisk eggs in a bowl.
Step 2: Chop vegetables.
Step 3: Heat butter in a pan.
Step 4: Add vegetables and sauté for 2 minutes.
Step 5: Pour eggs over veggies and cook until set.

Step 1: Rinse quinoa under cold water.
Step 2: Cook quinoa according to package directions.
Step 3: Chop tomatoes and lettuce.
Step 4: Mix quinoa with vegetables.
Step 5: Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

Step 1: Toast bread slices until golden.
Step 2: Mash avocado in a bowl.
Step 3: Season avocado with salt and lemon juice.
Step 4: Spread avocado on toast.
Step 5: Serve immediately.

Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2: Cook rice until tender.
Step 3: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Step 4: Stuff peppers with rice.
Step 5: Bake for 40 minutes.

Step 1: Spiralize zucchini into noodles.
Step 2: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Step 3: Add garlic and sauté.
Step 4: Add zucchini noodles and cook for 2–3 minutes.
Step 5: Serve immediately.

Step 1: Heat oil in a skillet.
Step 2: Add beef and cook until browned.
Step 3: Add chopped vegetables.
Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
Step 5: Cook until vegetables are tender.

Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Step 2: Peel and cube sweet potatoes.
Step 3: Toss with olive oil and salt.
Step 4: Roast for 25 minutes.
Step 5: Serve in a bowl.

Step 1: Heat butter in a pan.
Step 2: Add mushrooms and sauté.
Step 3: Add rice and stir.
Step 4: Slowly add broth while stirring.
Step 5: Cook until creamy.

Step 1: Spoon yogurt into a bowl.
Step 2: Add sliced fruit on top.
Step 3: Drizzle with honey if desired.
Step 4: Add granola.
Step 5: Serve chilled.

Step 1: Cook and dice chicken.
Step 2: Chop lettuce.
Step 3: Add chicken to salad bowl.
Step 4: Toss with dressing.
Step 5: Serve cold.

Step 1: Heat black beans in a pan.
Step 2: Warm taco shells.
Step 3: Fill shells with beans.
Step 4: Add toppings.
Step 5: Serve immediately.

Step 1: Season steak with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Heat grill or pan.
Step 3: Cook steak to desired doneness.
Step 4: Roast vegetables.
Step 5: Serve together.

Step 1: Crack eggs into a bowl.
Step 2: Whisk with salt and pepper.
Step 3: Heat butter in pan.
Step 4: Add spinach and cook briefly.
Step 5: Add eggs and scramble.

Step 1: Rinse rice.
Step 2: Add rice and coconut milk to pot.
Step 3: Bring to boil.
Step 4: Reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes.
Step 5: Fluff and serve.

Step 1: Chop tomatoes.
Step 2: Sauté garlic in pot.
Step 3: Add tomatoes and simmer.
Step 4: Add basil.
Step 5: Blend until smooth.

Step 1: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Step 2: Grill salmon for 4–5 minutes per side.
Step 3: Cook quinoa.
Step 4: Assemble bowl with quinoa and salmon.
Step 5: Serve warm.
